metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6314 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
The make_available_at_least function in io-tiff.c in gdk-pixbuf allowscontext-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop)via a large TIFF file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6314` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-gdkpixbuf-2.0 - 2.32.2-1ubuntu1.4
libgdk-pixbuf2.0-0 - 2.32.2-1ubuntu1.4
libgdk-pixbuf2.0-common - 2.32.2-1ubuntu1.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gdk-pixbuf package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.32.2-1ubuntu1.4').
